QuestData.Title: Ogre Diplomacy
QuestData.Description: Ogres are ogres. Spirits or not, the Ango'rosh are not different.$B$BEven with their ritual books, they won't relinquish their power to you until you prove yourself.$B$BI've fought ogres my entire life, and there's only one way to earn that.$B$BKilling them outright.$B$BThe more Ango'rosh spirits and their pets as you take out while you're there, the more respect you'll command among them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Ango'rosh in the Ango'rosh Ruins.
QuestData.CompletionText: I hope you've extended our diplomatic hand to our ogre friends.
